name: BUNNY STOPPER
description:
BUNNY STOPPER

Look, its pretty simple. You left your carrots outside and now a bunny wants them. You could just bring them inside or Just let the bunny have the carrots but you are bored..

So now we are going to play a game with the bunny.  Let's see how much of the bunny's time we can waste. At the start the bunny goes straight for the carrot. So it's your job to create a maze for him to waste as much time as possible.

Controls: 
  • LEFT CLICK to place blocks
  • RIGHT CLICK to remove blocks

Tools: Godot, Krita, LMMS

Made for Newbie Game Jam
